name: Wallup v4
body:
### Features
-	**High Quality** : We hand curate only highest quality wallpapers that look awesome on your device
-	**Stock Wallpapers** : One place to find all stock wallpapers for latest devices like OnePlus, Mi, Pixel etc
-	**Free to Use** : Download / Share / Set Wallpaper. Do anything as all wallpapers have free to use license
-	**Latest Images** : We update new wallpapers nearly everyday so can select from tons of wallpapers. We know that you need new wallpapers everytime to light up your screen ðŸ˜‰
-	**New Stock Wallpapers** : We add wallpapers for all the new devices launched on the market. As soon as the OEM launch, device wallpapers will be here
-	**Bookmark Images** : We give you simple option to bookmark(like) any image and view them anytime you like. Even if you reinstall the app, your bookmarks are always preserved ðŸ˜Š

name: v3.2.0
body:
#### Highlights of this Release

- Bug Fixes: Added image screen for cached images
- Other minor changes & performance improvements

name: v3.1.0
body:
#### Highlights of the release

- Reduced app size by 50%
- You can now view recent cached images
- Lot more customization option for cached images
- Various bug fixes

name: Major Release 3
body:
#### v3.0.0

One tap wallpaper. Now get access to over a million+ wallpapers directly from Unsplash. Just one tap to access a high-quality wallpaper directly on your homescreen (enable in settings). Along with Auto Wallpaper, you gonna love it.

name: Auto Wallpaper
body:
#### v2.1.0

**"Auto Wallpaper"** feature added which changes homescreen wallpaper after every user-defined interval

name: Overhauled version
body:
#### v2.0.1

Overhauled wallup targetting it towards a content discovery platform for images

name: First Production Release
body:
####  Release v1.0.0 (1st Jan'19)
â€¢ Overall design improvements.
â€¢ Create/delete custom collection.
â€¢ Pick image quality & location while downloading image.
â€¢ Option to change common setting like image quality, cache clear etc.
â€¢ Improvement: Revamped main screen to highlight image area more.
â€¢ Pan/Zoom image on the image details screen.
â€¢ No internet connection handling.
â€¢ Reload icon everywhere if connection fails.
â€¢ Long press on list image for common option.
â€¢ Many other changes & bug fixes.

#### Links -
- Available on [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dawnimpulse.wallup)
- Attached [apk file](https://github.com/DawnImpulse/wallup-android/releases/download/v1.0.0/WallUp-v1.0.0.apk)

body:
#### v0.4.0 (16th Sept '18)

â€¢ New: Photographer's collections in their profile.
â€¢ New: Open unsplash photo links directly in Wallup.
â€¢ New: Wallup's own collections available in the app.
â€¢ New: Way to let user's know about the upcoming updates. No more guessing friends.
â€¢ New: Shared images will be now saved in Downloads/Wallup/ .
â€¢ Bug Fixed: Image sharing crash on device running Android 7 & above.

name: First basic release
body:
#### v0.2.0 (2nd Sept '18)

- You can now find downloaded images in /Download folder
- Addition of photographers profile when clicked on name/image
- Various changes to Image Preview activity
    - Exif data is available
    - Temporary image while full image is loading
    - Crashed fixed while setting wallpaper
    - Color changes based on image
- Random images in main screen bottom navigation
- New Splash Screen
- New Latest Changes Screen

#### Links -
- Available on [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dawnimpulse.wallup)
- Attached [apk file](https://github.com/DawnImpulse/wallup-android/releases/download/v0.1.0/WallUp-v0.1.0.apk)

name: Initial Release
body:
#### Wallup first public beta.

The release includes basic functionalities including
- lists of recent, trending & curated images from Unsplash
- ability to view the various counters for images eg likes, downloads etc.
- downloading the image in full quality & setting the image as wallpaper.

#### Links -
- Available on [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dawnimpulse.wallup)
- Attached [apk file](https://github.com/DawnImpulse/wallup-android/releases/download/v0.1.0/WallUp-v0.1.0.apk)
